name: @summit/iab
description: Incident Attestation Bundler CLI for assembling signed incident artifact bundles.

scripts.bundle:sample: npm run build && node dist/index.js bundle --incident ../../samples/iab/sample-incident.json --output ../../samples/iab/sample-bundle.tgz --private-key ../../samples/iab/keys/sample-private.pem
scripts.verify:sample: npm run build && node dist/index.js verify --bundle ../../samples/iab/sample-bundle.tgz --public-key ../../samples/iab/keys/sample-public.pem
scripts.test: npm run clean --silent || true && npm run bundle:sample && npm run verify:sample

author: Summit Engineering
